changelog:
### Iconify v6.2.0 has arrived! It has the following new changes:

## Feature Changes:
- __Settings Icons:__
    - Allow option to change icon size and shape
- __Brightness Bar:__
    - Added translucent outline brightness bar
- __QS Panel Tiles:__
    - Added translucent outline QS shape
- __Notification:__
    - Added iOS style notification shape
- __Progress Bar:__
    - Added lighty style progress bar
- __Switch:__
    - Added 5 new switch style
- __Color Engine:__
    - Added option to enable or disable system monet
- __Navigation Bar:__
    - Added ability to change pill width and thickness
- __Miscellaneous:__
    - Added notch bar killer overlay
- __XPosed Menu:__
    - Added option to transparent notification shade only
    - Added light QS theme in light mode for pixel roms
    - Added black QS theme in light mode for other roms
    - Added Fluid QS theme AKA. two-tone accent theme
    - Added 16 battery icons including iOS 15 and 16 style
    - Fixed QS panel top margin for QPR2+ roms
    - Fixed Header Clock for QPR2+ roms
    - Fixed vertical tile's text animation
    - Improved header image to be hidden in landscape
    - Added option to hide carrier groups
    - Added option to hide statusbar in lockscreen
- __Settings:__
    - Added language selection
    - Added app theme selection
- __Internal:__
    - Fixed app crash in certain situations

## Translation Credits:
- French @MXC48
- Indonesian @KaeruShi
- Persian @Faceless1999
- Portuguese @ElTifo
- Russian @B1ays
- Simplified Chinese @Cccc-owo
- Turkish @serhat-demir
- Vietnamese @viettel1211

Also included in this version are bug fixes and other improvements.
